Body:
SAMPLE_CODE1 = """
class B(object):

    __slots__ = ['bar']

"""
SAMPLE_CODE2 = """
class B(object):

    __slots__ = ['bar', 'foo']

    def m1(self):
        self.bar = 10
        return 1

"""
self.make_mod(sample=SAMPLE_CODE1)
import x
B = x.B
self.make_mod(sample=SAMPLE_CODE2)
pydevd_reload.xreload(x)
b = B()
self.assertEqual(1, b.m1())
self.assertEqual(10, b.bar)
self.assertRaises(Exception, setattr, b, 'foo', 20)
